description: The Veeam Backup Enterprise Manager has recently been identified as having newly discovered vulnerabilities that could potentially expose users to cybersecurity risks. These vulnerabilities were flagged through Veeam's rigorous internal testing and security programs, leading to the creation of a fix. Customers are advised to download and deploy this fix to mitigate any associated risks. Keeping the software updated to the most recent version is strongly recommended as it significantly reduces these vulnerabilities. For further details, a Knowledge Base article (KB4581) has been published, outlining the identified issues and resolutions available.
